dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HCON 29 IH: Expressing support for the withdrawal of the United States from the Paris Agreement.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barr (for himself and Mr. Moore of West Virginia) submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: Expressing support for the withdrawal of the United States from the Paris Agreement.

section.text: That Congress supports the action of the President to withdraw the United States from the Paris Agreement. In the preceding sentence, the term Paris Agreement means the decision by the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Changeâ€™s 21st Conference of Parties in Paris, France, adopted December 12, 2015.
